name: Emspoma Warming Massage Emulsion 500 ml
descr:
Designed for massage and self-massage with the aim of evoking feelings of warmth and heat with a long-term effect. It can be also used as a preventive massage against cramps and coordination problems.
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 200 ml and 1000 ml version.
